value.title: Introduction to AI technology for business leaders
value.excerpt: This learning path helps business leaders discover and describe the primary concepts of AI, and the transformational impact AI can have in their organization.

topItems.title: Introduction to AI technology
topItems.excerpt: Learn the primary concepts and technologies of AI, and how Microsoft is turning the latest AI into tools, products, and services that organizations can leverage

topItems.title: Examine the Microsoft approach to artificial intelligence
topItems.excerpt: Learn how Microsoft creates products, services, and solutions to help organizations leverage AI. Understand how these technologies relate to business problems.

value.title: Large-Scale Data Processing with Azure Data Lake Storage Gen2
value.excerpt: With this learning path, you'll use Azure Data Lake Storage to process your Big Data efficiently and easily while also being protected by Azureâ€™s host of security features.

topItems.title: Introduction to Azure Data Lake storage
topItems.excerpt: Discover how Data Lake Storage provides a repository where you can upload and store unstructured data bringing new efficiencies to processing big data analytics.

topItems.title: Upload data to Azure Data Lake Storage
topItems.excerpt: Learn about creating an Azure Data Lake Storage account and uploading data to Data Lake Storage Gen 2 through the Azure Storage Explorer.

topItems.title: Secure your Azure Storage account
topItems.excerpt: Learn how Azure Storage provides multilayered security to protect your data with access keys, secure networks, and Advanced Threat Protection monitoring.

value.title: Process and translate text with Azure Cognitive Services
value.excerpt: Process and translate text with Azure Cognitive Services

topItems.title: Extract insights from text with the Text Analytics service
topItems.excerpt: Extract insights from text with the Text Analytics service

topItems.title: Translate text with the Translator service
topItems.excerpt: Translate text with the Translator service

value.title: Run VMware workloads on Azure VMware Solution
value.excerpt: Learn about Azure VMware Solution, how to deploy the resource, and how to migrate VMware virtual machines on-premises.

topItems.title: Migrate VMware workloads on-premises to Azure VMware Solution
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to migrate virtual machines from an on-premises VMware environment to Azure VMware Solution by using VMware HCX.

value.title: Use basketball stats to optimize game play with Visual Studio Code, inspired by SPACE JAM: A NEW LEGACY
value.excerpt: This *Space Jam: A New Legacy* - inspired learning path aims to equip you with data science, web development skills, and coding strategies to impact a game of basketball in real time, ensuring victory for the Tune Squad in their next game.

topItems.title: Create a web app that uses data to make decisions on the basketball court
topItems.excerpt: Create a web app by using JavaScript, Azure, GitHub, and Visual Studio Code to help the Tune Squad coach use data to make decisions on the basketball court, inspired by SPACE JAM: A NEW LEGACY.

value.title: Add custom domain name to Azure Active Directory
value.excerpt: Learn how to add custom domain name to Azure Active Directory.

value.title: Analyze climate data with Azure Notebooks
value.excerpt: Create an Azure Notebook and use three popular Python libraries to analyze climate data collected by NASA, then share it.

images.title: Analyze climate data with Azure Notebooks

value.title: Analyze and optimize data warehouse storage in Azure Synapse Analytics
value.excerpt: Analyze and optimize data warehouse storage in Azure Synapse Analytics

value.title: Automate the configuration of Windows Server IaaS Virtual Machines
value.excerpt: You'll be able to deploy Desired State Configuration (DSC) extensions, implement those extensions to remediate noncompliant servers, and use custom script extension.

value.title: Microsoft Azure Artificial Intelligence (AI) strategy and solutions
value.excerpt: This module provides an overview of Azure AI and demonstrates how Microsoft tools, services, and infrastructure can help make AI real for your organization, whether you want to unlock insights from your latent data with knowledge mining, develop your own AI models with machine learning, or build immersive apps using AI.

value.title: Introduction to blockchain on Azure
value.excerpt: Introduction to blockchain on Azure. See how blockchain allows business partners to trust each other's data without a central authority. You'll also learn a bit about how blockchain works. The goal is to help you decide if blockchain is a good choice for your scenario.

value.title: Deploy and configure servers, instances, and databases for Azure SQL
value.excerpt: Deploy and configure servers, instances, and databases for Azure SQL

value.title: Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework - Reliability
value.excerpt: Learn how to recover from infrastructure and service failure, loss of data, and disasters by incorporating reliability into your architecture.

value.title: Back up and restore your Azure SQL database
value.excerpt: Protect the data in your Azure SQL database and recover from data loss or corruption with backup and restore.

value.title: Edit code through branching and merging in Git
value.excerpt: Level up your Git knowledge by learning about how to keep code separate using branches and how to merge them later

value.title: Build an Azure Digital Twins graph for a chocolate factory production line
value.excerpt: This module covers the first steps in building an Azure Digital Twins solution. The units cover making an instance of Azure Digital Twins, and learning about, creating, and visualizing, DTDL models. You will create, validate, graph, and query, models for a chocolate factory production line.

value.title: ExposeÂ multiple Azure Function apps as a consistent API by using Azure API Management
value.excerpt: In this module, you will learn how to assemble multiple Azure Functions into a single API using Azure API Management.

value.title: Build systems of insights for enterprise scale with Power BI and Azure
value.excerpt: Build systems of insights for enterprise scale with Power BI and Azure

value.title: Choose the appropriate API for Azure Cosmos DB
value.excerpt: Compare the different APIs that are available in Azure Cosmos DB, highlighting and contrasting the different scenarios that would make them a good choice for a company.

value.title: Classify and moderate text with Azure Content Moderator
value.excerpt: In this module, we'll introduce you to Azure Content Moderator and show how to use it for text moderation

value.title: Classify images with the Microsoft Custom Vision Service
value.excerpt: In this learning path, find out how Cognitive Vision Services detects faces, tags and classifies images, and identifies objects.

value.title: Discover sentiment in text with the Text Analytics API
value.excerpt: Learn how to use the Text Analytics API and Azure Functions to discover what your customers are really saying in their feedback about your products or brands.

value.title: Build applications on the cloud
value.excerpt: Carnegie Mellon University's Cloud Developer course. Learn how developers write programs that run on the cloud, including how to deploy, be fault-tolerant, load balance, scale, and deal with latency.

value.title: Foundations of cloud computing for administrators
value.excerpt: Cloud Admin course from Dr. Majd Sakr at Carnegie Mellon University. Learn about the cloud, including the history, building blocks, and types on your way to becoming a Cloud Administrator.

value.title: Automate cloud resource management
value.excerpt: Cloud Admin course from Dr. Majd Sakr at Carnegie Mellon University. Learn about how to automate cloud resource management with scripts and infrastructure-as-code tools like Terraform.

value.title: Configure administrative roles in Microsoft 365
value.excerpt: Configure administrative roles in Microsoft 365

value.title: Configure and manage secrets in Azure Key Vault
value.excerpt: Configure and manage secrets in Azure Key Vault

value.title: Configure Azure Synapse Link with Azure Cosmos DB
value.excerpt: Configure Azure Synapse Link with Azure Cosmos DB

value.title: Add conversational intelligence to your apps by using Language Understanding Intelligent Service (LUIS)
value.excerpt: In this module, we'll introduce you to Language Understanding Intelligent Service (LUIS) and show how to build and publish a LUIS model

value.title: Create and implement application allowlists with adaptive application control
value.excerpt: You'll be able to implement Adaptive application controls within your organization to protect your Windows Server IaaS VMs.
